title: Liga Nexo Web & API
description: Project to create a website with statistics and results of the Nexo League teams. Using an API created from data from the Tormeta Circuit website. For educational purposes.

title: Oxyevents - Organizaci√≥n de eventos
description: This project is an informative website about Oxygen Gaming Events, a company that organise events. In this webpage we can see their events, clients, information about them and also the services they offer.

title: WeddingLand - A Wedding Landing Page
description: This project is an informative website with wedding content. You can see place and date information, transport, recomendations and wedding list.

title: RutiAPP Frontend
description: This project is a web application and android APP that save your progress in gym. You can save you exersises and the weight you are lifting in that moment. You can look for your history and see your progress. It has a user system with register form and login form.
stack: NodeJS, Express, Mysql, ReactJS, Bootstrap, Javascript, JWT Auth, Ionic, Capacitor

title: RutiAPP Backend
description: This project is a application that save your progress in gym. You can save you exersises and the weight you are lifting in that moment. You can look for your history and see your progress. It has a user system with register form and login form.
stack: NodeJS, Express, Mysql, ReactJS, Bootstrap, Javascript, JWT Auth

title: RetroBooks - Landing Page
description: This project is a Landing page for an ebooks APP. This is just an informative website where you can pricing section, download section and a support section.

title: Oxygen-Gaming: Frontend
description: This project is an informative website about Oxygen Gaming an esports club. In this website the owner can add information using an admin menu that was created for him. It shows news, players, team matches and results, their sponsor. Also it has an user system where people can register. It has a role system which can be used to assign people different function as news writer or matches manager.
stack: Java 14, Angular 12, HTML & CSS, Spring boot 2, Bootstrap 5, Mysql, API Rest for backend

title: Oxygen-Gaming: Backend
description: This project is an informative website about Oxygen Gaming an esports club. In this website the owner can add information using an admin menu that was created for him. It shows news, players, team matches and results, their sponsor. Also it has an user system where people can register. It has a role system which can be used to assign people different function as news writer or matches manager.
stack: Java 14, Angular 12, HTML & CSS, Spring boot 2, Bootstrap 5, Mysql, API Rest for backend

title: Lugo Gaming Fest Web: esports event
description: This project is a website for an esports event located in Lugo. This website shows information about events news, tournaments, workshops, live music events and LugoGamingFest social networks.

title: Lugo Gaming Fest: under construction
description: This project is a website for an esports event located in Lugo. While the website was under development this placeholder page was used with some information about the event and their social networks.

title: Oxygen-Gaming 2022: esports club
description: This project is an informative website about Oxygen Gaming an esports club. In this website the owner can add information using Wordpress CMS. It shows news, players, events. Also it has a shop where people can buy offial clothes.
